snippet: As part of our continuing coverage of the Affordable Care Act, we have been reporting regularly on how small-business owners expect the new law to affect their businesses. Now, as the law begins to take effect, we are interested in speaking with more...
lead_paragraph: As part of our continuing coverage of the Affordable Care Act, we have been reporting regularly on how small-business owners expect the new law to affect their businesses. Now, as the law begins to take effect, we are interested in speaking with more business owners about its impact.

headline.main: Contribute to Our Reporting on the Affordable Care Act
